paas_description: PAAs provide peer advice to fellow students about a wide range of academically-related topics. With personal experience as a Rice student and training from the Office of Academic Advising, PAAs offer accurate advice regarding specific courses, co-curricular opportunities, academic rules and procedures, and a wide range of other topics.
